StatDef.label: fracturing efficiency
StatDef.description: How efficient this explosive is at producing usable chunks when breaking stone.

StatDef.label: mining yield
StatDef.description: How efficient this explosive is at breaking resource-rich rocks.

StatDef.label: wood breaking yield
StatDef.description: How efficient this explosive is at producing usable wood from destroyed trees. Explosive forestry is best forestry.

StatDef.label: power consumption
StatDef.description: The amount of power consumed by this building. Produces power when the value is negative.

StatDef.label: detonator signal range
StatDef.description: The radius in which a detonator is able to detect and detonate remote explosives.

StatDef.label: sun exposure
StatDef.description: The amount of sunlight this solar panel receives. Boosts power production in the morning and evening hours.

StatDef.label: power capacity
StatDef.description: The amount of power this battery can store.

StatDef.label: gas venting power
StatDef.description: The amount gas concentration pushed by a vent per second.

StatDef.label: sensor angle
StatDef.description: The angle in which the sensor can simultaneously detect targets.

StatDef.label: sensor range
StatDef.description: The maximum range at which the sensor is able to detect targets.

StatDef.label: sensor rotation speed
StatDef.description: How fast the sensor rotates (degrees per second).
